abstract: The sentence handed down on Raj Rajaratnam, the former chief of the Galleon Group hedge fund, continues a trend of ever-stiffer penalties against white-collar criminals.
snippet: The sentence handed down on Raj Rajaratnam, the former chief of the Galleon Group hedge fund, continues a trend of ever-stiffer penalties against white-collar criminals.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods

headline.main: Galleon Chief Sentenced to 11-Year Term in Insider Case
